Content: UPFA General Secretary, Minister Mahinda Amaraweera stated that he would not think that northern provincial council Chief Minister C.V. Vigneswaran will face the same fate that befell the former chief ministers of Northern Province in the past. Addressing a ceremony held in Tangalle yesterday, the minister stated that the government will not allow any mechanism that would divide the country or betray the war heroes. Meanwhile, Joint Opposition representative, MP Vasudewa Nanayakkara expressed his views with regard to Northern provincial Council Chief Minister C.V. Vigneswaran. MP Vasudeva Nanayakkara stated this while expressing his views at a ceremony held in Ratnapura yesterday.
